sources.description:
Lina, multicorned, decides to give her husband tit for tat: she then goes with her friend Piero to the same dubious boarding house where her husband is staying with his lover on duty

Colorized version https://youtu.be/fLAd8fK9iOQ

Genre: Italian Cinema, 60's Comedy

Summary: A Tale of Adultery, Insecurity, Jealousy, and Love
